doc.field: Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Photographs
Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Photographs

Propaganda: (Anti-Fascist "Book" in street with Spanish pedestrians, [1936-1940s?] 2 photos); ("Citizens Traverse Propaganda-Laden Streets in Spain"); (Lone Soldier); (letter referring to aerial bombardment, Nov 19, 1936); (Popular Front propaganda surrounding doorways "El Glorioso Ejercito" ); (Poster, at a distance, blurred); (soldier with tasseled hat embraces dark-haired beauty); (Spanish Shop Workers' Union lists volunteers "100.000 Voluntaris el CA.A.D.CA.I. Sol 5.000 Voluntaris"); (two female comrades, arm in arm); ("Typical Soldier" pulling grenade pin)

Sol 5.000 Voluntaris"); (two female comrades, arm in arm); ("Typical Soldier" pulling grenade pin)
